mapper.insert: insert into charcha_cart ( cartId, memberId, productId, productCount) values (cartId, #{memberId}, #{productId}, #{productCount} )
mapper.select: select cartId, c.memberId as memberId, memberName, p.productId as productId, productName, productPrice, (productPrice*productCount) as money, productCount from charcha_memberlist m, charcha_cart c, charcha_Productlist p where m.memberId =c.memberId and c.productId=p.productId and c.memberId=#{memberId} order by cartId
